tp:treatment-sec.p:
Holotrichia gressitti Frey, 1970: 249
, 263 ( type loc.: Vientiane , Laos ).

Frey (1970) described
Holotrichia gressitti
based on three female specimens designated as a holotype and two paratypes , remaining the male unknown. We have studied one paratype (NHMB) which shows external morphology characteristic of
Miridiba
. Moreover, female genitalia has features not shared with species of other genital morphotypes. Hence, the female genitalia of morphotype II “ Gressitti ” was described based on this species ( Fig. 7 ). Moreover, the male genitalia of
M. gressitti
is described based on a paratype of
Miridiba herteli
(see remarks under
M. herteli
), which is described in morphotype II “ Gressitti ” ( Figs 5–6 ).
